name: Pixel Blast
description:
Pixel Blast is a retro style of space shooter with the Aliens.

You must destroy them all & survive as long as you can to beat the score.

This game will give you intense gaming experience in the old fashion way (Play It To Experience It)

How To Play:

1. Shoot
2. Destroy
3. Survive
4. Share your score on social media
5. Be The BEST !!!

So enjoy this Pixel Blasting Alien game and fulfill your mission to be the Best of the Best.
